name: Gift Of The Master
Lore: '''Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends.''',
Text: 'Unless Deep Hatred on table, deploy on table.  Once per turn, may deploy Blaster Rack or The Force Unleashed from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Once per turn, may lose 1 Force to deploy a character weapon (except Thermal Detonator) from Lost Pile.  ''Vader'' on The Empire''s Back may be treated as ''Galen.'' (Immune to Alter.)',
